title: Guess the sleeper OP champion.
body:
Ive been a top meta pick every season.
I have one of the best initiates and escapes in the game.
I am one of the best gankers in the game.
I can build tank and still do tons of damage because percent health bitches.
I constantly get buffs I dont need because the community complains that my ult is broken.
I am not Lee Sin

Who am I?

replies.body: Um Jarvan....? But he's not BETTER than Lee Sin, Lee is more mobile and has more in his kit.

> [{quoted}](name=Nasreth,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AKbjO9aj,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-01-22T15:10:36.318+0000)
>
> Gnar

Gnar has not been in the league EVERY SEASON.

> [{quoted}](name=Saevum,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AKbjO9aj,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-01-22T15:12:15.102+0000)
>
> Gnar has not been in the league EVERY SEASON.

oh you're right. didnt notice that requirement.  it's probably Sion then. he's realllllly good.

edit: no nevermind he was really bad for a couple season..... yeah idk. im not gonna say J4 because he's farthest from "sleeper" OP. He's just known OP.  

Mundo maybe?  Wouldn't call him OP... wouldn't say his initiate is incredible either.

Whatever. I'm just gonna go with Poppy and call it a day.
I thought it was common knowledge that J4 was broken?

>I can build tank and still do tons of damage because percent health bitches.

10% current hp (with a 400 damage cap) every 10-6 seconds isn't tons of damage, especially when full tank your bases only deal a total of 940 physical damage.  Most tanks can reach or outdo that pretty easily.
Probably either Elise or Amumu.  I think I'll go with Amumu since no one guessed him yet.

I'm sorry, but if this is about JIV you're way overrating his percent health in terms of damage. Sure it hits hard, but that's only gonna hit once every 10/8/6 seconds. It's not his damage that kills you if he builds tank, it's his ability to stick to you and keep you where he wants you until his team gets there because, honestly, he isn't dealing a whole lot of damage outside of that.

Am I saying he deals no damage at all as a tank? No way. I've come to love Jarvan because he fits my style of offensive tanking, I'm not much for those passive sorts of tanks that are just kinda *there*, but he is in no way dealing tons of damage.

Vi? She has not been around *every* season.
If not, Sejuani? She's not sleeper anymore however.
Idk.
It sort of seems like you are talking about Jarvan but he has been an obvious OP jungler since preseason started.

{{champion:59}}

Sleeper is also the difficulty of this question
